name: Desert Philosophy
description: A deep conversation about mirages and reality in the desert

conversation.speaker: CHARACTER_1
conversation.text: In the desert, you see things that aren't really there - mirages.

conversation.speaker: CHARACTER_2
conversation.text: Is that so different from our everyday perception of reality?

conversation.speaker: CHARACTER_1
conversation.text: Perhaps all of life is a mirage - we see what we want to see.

conversation.speaker: CHARACTER_2
conversation.text: Or maybe the desert strips away illusions, showing us truth in its bareness.

conversation.speaker: CHARACTER_1
conversation.text: Like walking between these cacti - each step reveals something real and sharp.

conversation.speaker: CHARACTER_2
conversation.text: The heat, the sand, the endless horizon - they force us to confront ourselves.

audioConfig.voiceInstructions: Contemplative desert wanderer. Speak with the wisdom of someone who has spent years in solitude. Dry humor, long pauses as if conserving words like water.
Mystical and profound. Voice carries the mystery of desert nights. Speak as if each word is a revelation discovered in the vast emptiness.
